mapper.select: SELECT t.TaskID, t.StoryID, t.ShortName, t.Description, t.StartDate, t.EndDate, t.ActualStartDate, t.ActualEndDate, t.Status FROM Task t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.StoryID = #{storyID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Task( StoryID, ShortName, Description, StartDate, EndDate, ActualStartDate, ActualEndDate, Status )VALUES ( #{story.storyID}, #{shortName}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{actualStartDate}, #{actualEndDate}, #{status} )
